name: Feed the Animals
description: This game helps improving children's coordination skills. "Grab an animal and help them reach their destination: a crate of food. But be careful not to touch any of the tree stumps." Level 18 is a bonus where you ought to avoid windblown leaves and collect the apples, with Ladybird.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
